SHERWOOD PICKING v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 43308. Decided March 7, 1938] Mr. Fred W. Shields for the plaintiff. Mr. George A. King and King dt King were on the briefs. Mr. Louis R. Mehlinger, with whom was Mr. Assistant Attorney General Sam E. Whitaker, for the defendant.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
